text: 12:2 Efesus 1:18; 4:23; 5:10; 5:17; Kolosi 1:21; 1 Pita 1:14; 1 Jon 2:15Ia nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamiziba amir arazibar gɨn mangan markɨ. Ia teghtɨma God nɨghnɨzir igiaba ia danɨngtɨ ia arazir igiabar amuam. Kamaghɨn, ia Godɨn ifongiam gɨfogham, a kamakɨn: ia arazir aghuiba, ko God bar akongezir araziba, ko arazir bar deragha arazir mabagh afiraziba, ia dagh fogham.
